segments.text: You don ’ t look so good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel horrible . I think I picked up a bug .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know who you got it from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A lot of people in my dorm are sick . Perhaps I picked it up there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you take any cold medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been taking vitamin C and zinc and trying to get some rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that rest and liquids are what doctors recommend for a cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My grandmother swears by hot chicken soup for a cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A pharmacist might be able to help you if your home remedies don ’ t work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , if I get worse , I will definitely look for extra help with this .
segments.speaker: S2
